definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
(coll.) old man/(said of an aging husband) my old man

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪头子困兽犹斗，在绝望中向四面八方乱打一气。

sentences.english: That ( old ) gaffer going into the pub is 90 years old.
sentences.chinese: 走进酒店的那个老头子已经90岁了。
你这个满脸鼻涕的老头子。

sentences.english: And you , fucking tell him now . what geezer.
sentences.chinese: 就一个老头子而言，你的身板儿还挺不错的。

sentences.english: The old man kissed his knees and called him the good God.
sentences.chinese: 那个老头子吻着他的膝头，称他为慈悲的上帝。

sentences.english: But the giggle also tells you who's boss.
sentences.chinese: 而且，这个“笑声”还能告诉你谁是头子。

sentences.english: Jack pours the spirit into Molly's father's cup personally.
sentences.chinese: 杰克亲自给老头子斟上酒。

sentences.english: "Do you have scruples about that old headman in the temple?"The sea pumice disagrees a way.
sentences.chinese: “你顾忌宫里那个老头子？”海浮石不以为然道。

sentences.english: Like an animal at bay, the bandit chieftain laid about him in desperation.
sentences.chinese: 土匪头子困兽犹斗，在绝望中向四面八方乱打一气。

sentences.english: Lao Tzu rebuked the dissipated rulers living in extravagance at his time as bandit chieftains.
sentences.chinese: 老子指责当时过着骄奢淫逸生活的统治者为强盗头子。

sentences.english: I tried to stone a cat but she jumped on my back.
sentences.chinese: 我曾试图用石头子儿打一只猫，可她跳到了我的背上。

sentences.english: I hope you like old fogy food.
sentences.chinese: 希望你们会喜欢老头子吃的菜。

sentences.english: On the walls are various paintings of Russian generals and intelligence chiefs.
sentences.chinese: 在墙上，还有很多俄罗斯将军和特务头子的画像。

sentences.english: I remember of that disgusting old man.
sentences.chinese: 我想起那个糟老头子来了。

sentences.english: She wants to marry an old rich man.
sentences.chinese: 她想嫁一个有钱的老头子。

definition: dog's leg/fig. one who follows a villain/henchman/hired thug
bunch of gangsters/criminal gang/organized crime syndicate
soldier (from the two components of the 兵 character) (derog.)
